attributes.action: Make sure cuts as a result of the EU Referendum effect all civilians equally
attributes.additional_details:
Of all budget cuts in the past few years pensioners have received received very few and have been protected under the "triple lock pension":
http://www.pensionsadvisoryservice.org.uk/news/prime-minister-to-protect-the-triple-lock

If young families have their welfare cut due to the EU result then it is only fair that pensioners should too:

http://www.saga.co.uk/magazine/money/retirement/benefits/cameron-pledges-to-protect-pensioner-benefits.aspx
attributes.background:
The referendum was a choice that everyone was involved in. we feel that it is only fair that the results and effects of the referendum should be shared equally.

This means that pensioners -not just people of working age- should contribute to cuts needed and that no group should be exempt.
